CustomField.description: We have feature to copy and move files from one folder to another folder. We have a component to copy / move files across folders and this component shows only those files for which this action is enabled. So you can enable copy & move action at the S3-File record level by checking "Allow copy & move" in S3-File. So if you want to enable it by default for all new S3-Files, you can check this checkbox.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: We have feature to copy and move files from one folder to another folder. We have a component to copy / move files across folders and this component shows only those files for which this action is enabled. So you can enable copy & move action at the S3-File record level by checking "Allow copy & move" in S3-File. So if you want to enable it by default for all new S3-Files, you can check this checkbox.
CustomField.label: Default Allow Copy & Move
